## assertNotIncludes() function

Assert that a string is <b>not</b> included in another, or object is <b>not</b> included in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertNotIncludes<T>(haystack: T[], needle: T, message?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  haystack | T\[\] | The thing to search in. |
|  needle | T | The thing to search for. |
|  message | string | Optional error message if the assertion does not hold. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```javascript
assertNotIncludes('foobar', 'xxx');
assertNotIncludes([9, 5, 3], 2);

```
 T
